verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:13
verses.text: Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred and threescore and six talents of gold;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:14
verses.text: Beside that which chapmen and merchants brought. And all the kings of Arabia and governors of the country brought gold and silver to Solomon.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:15
verses.text: And king Solomon made two hundred targets of beaten gold: six hundred shekels of beaten gold went to one target.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:16
verses.text: And three hundred shields made he of beaten gold: three hundred shekels of gold went to one shield. And the king put them in the house of the forest of Lebanon.
